attributes.action: Allow 16 year olds to be able to ride a 125cc motor bike on a cbt
attributes.additional_details: Because at the age of 16 you are allowed to ride a 50cc motor bike but on the fast roads today it is dangerous as there is not enough power in the bike to avoid collisions or dangerous situations where as if we had the extra power like in a 125cc bike we can avoid cars that are not paying attention
attributes.background: Allow 16 year old to be able to ride a 125cc motorbike on a cbt

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578625
